languages.text: Пленение Ноль-Халифа повергло Механикус в трепет. Пав на колени перед полубогом в цепях, они утратили решимость и более не вмешивались в управление колонией. Обретая все большую дерзость, наместники Вольного Торговца получали доступ к таинствам, недоступным мирянам, и передавали их свое{mf|му|й} госпо{mf|дину|же}.

The subjugation of Null Caliph left the Adeptus Mechanicus in awe. Kneeling before the chained demigod, they lost their resolve and no longer interfered in the governance of the colony. With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader's viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their {mf|master|mistress}.
languages.original_text: Пленение Ноль-Халифа повергло Механикус в трепет. Пав на колени перед полубогом в цепях, они утратили решимость и более не вмешивались в управление колонией. Обретая все большую дерзость, наместники Вольного Торговца получали доступ к таинствам, недоступным мирянам, и передавали их свое{mf|му|й} госпо{mf|дину|же}.

traits.locale_text: The subjugation of Null Caliph left the Mechanicus in awe. Kneeling before the chained demigod, they lost their resolve and no longer interfered in the governance of the colony. With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their \{mf|master|mistress}.

With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their \{mf|master|mistress}.

With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader's viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their {mf|master|mistress}.

The subjugation of Null Caliph left the Mechanicus in awe. Kneeling before the chained demigod, they lost their resolve and no longer interfered in the governance of the colony. With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader's viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their {mf|master|mistress}.

The subjugation of Null Caliph left the Adeptus Mechanicus in awe. Kneeling before the chained demigod, they lost their resolve and no longer interfered in the governance of the colony. With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader's viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their {mf|master|mistress}.

languages.text: 行商浪人征服了虚无哈里发，这让整个机械修会敬畏不已。他们跪在被锁住的半神面前，完全听命于行商浪人，不再干涉殖民地的管理工作。于是，行商浪人手下的总督们的胆子越来越大。他们获得了无数教外人士原本无法获得的圣物，将这些礼物献给了他们的{mf|主人|女主人}。
languages.original_text: The subjugation of Null Caliph left the Adeptus Mechanicus in awe. Kneeling before the chained demigod, they lost their resolve and no longer interfered in the governance of the colony. With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader's viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人征服了虚无哈里发，这让整个机械修会敬畏不已。他们跪在被锁住的半神面前，完全听命于行商浪人，不再干涉殖民地的管理工作。于是，行商浪人手下的总督们的胆子越来越大。他们获得了无数教外人士原本无法获得的圣物，将这些礼物献给了他们的{mf|主人|女主人}。

languages.text: ヌル・カリフの服従は帝国技術局に畏敬の念を抱かせた。鎖に繋がれた半神の前に跪くと、彼らの決意は揺らぎ、コロニーの統治にそれ以上は干渉しなかった。これまでになく大胆さを増した自由開拓者の総督は俗人では近づくことが許されない聖体へのアクセスを獲得し、それを主人へと引き渡した。
languages.original_text: The subjugation of Null Caliph left the Adeptus Mechanicus in awe. Kneeling before the chained demigod, they lost their resolve and no longer interfered in the governance of the colony. With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader's viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: ヌル・カリフの服従は帝国技術局に畏敬の念を抱かせた。鎖に繋がれた半神の前に跪くと、彼らの決意は揺らぎ、コロニーの統治にそれ以上は干渉しなかった。これまでになく大胆さを増した自由開拓者の総督は俗人では近づくことが許されない聖体へのアクセスを獲得し、それを主人へと引き渡した。

languages.text: L'asservissement de Null Caliph impressionna l'Adeptus Mechanicus. À genoux devant le demi-dieu enchaîné, ses membres perdirent leur détermination et cessèrent leur ingérence dans la gouvernance de la colonie. Avec une audace croissante, les vice-rois {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} purent approcher de sacrements inaccessibles aux profanes qu'ils remirent à leur {mf|maître|maîtresse}.
languages.original_text: The subjugation of Null Caliph left the Adeptus Mechanicus in awe. Kneeling before the chained demigod, they lost their resolve and no longer interfered in the governance of the colony. With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader's viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: L'asservissement de Null Caliph impressionna l'Adeptus Mechanicus. À genoux devant le demi-dieu enchaîné, ses membres perdirent leur détermination et cessèrent leur ingérence dans la gouvernance de la colonie. Avec une audace croissante, les vice-rois {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} purent approcher de sacrements inaccessibles aux profanes qu'ils remirent à leur {mf|maître|maîtresse}.

languages.text: La subyugación de Null Caliph dejó al Adeptus Mechanicus estupefacto. Arrodillados ante el semidiós encadenado, su determinación se quebró y dejaron de interferir en el gobierno de la colonia. Los virreyes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente accedieron cada vez con más osadía a los sacramentos reservados para los iniciados y se los entregaron a su señor{mf||a}.
languages.original_text: The subjugation of Null Caliph left the Adeptus Mechanicus in awe. Kneeling before the chained demigod, they lost their resolve and no longer interfered in the governance of the colony. With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader's viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: La subyugación de Null Caliph dejó al Mechanicus estupefacto. Arrodillados ante el semidiós encadenado, su determinación se quebró y dejaron de interferir en el gobierno de la colonia. Los virreyes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente accedieron cada vez con más osadía a los sacramentos reservados para los iniciados y se los entregaron a su señor{mf||a}.

languages.text: Die Unterwerfung von Null Caliph sorgte für Ehrfurcht beim Adeptus Mechanicus. Sie knieten vor dem angeketteten Halbgott, büßten ihre Entschlossenheit ein und mischten sich nicht mehr in die Leitung der Kolonie ein. Mit zunehmendem Mut verschafften die Vizekönige {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sich Zugang zu Sakramenten, die dem Laienstand versperrt waren, und übergaben sie {mf|ihrem Herrn|ihrer Herrin}.
languages.original_text: The subjugation of Null Caliph left the Adeptus Mechanicus in awe. Kneeling before the chained demigod, they lost their resolve and no longer interfered in the governance of the colony. With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader's viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: Die Unterwerfung von Null Caliph sorgte für Ehrfurcht beim Mechanicus. Sie knieten vor dem angeketteten Halbgott, büßten ihre Entschlossenheit ein und mischten sich nicht mehr in die Leitung der Kolonie ein. Mit zunehmendem Mut verschafften die Vizekönige {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sich Zugang zu Sakramenten, die dem Laienstand versperrt waren, und übergaben sie {mf|ihrem Herrn|ihrer Herrin}.

languages.text: Hiçlik Halifesi'nin zaptı, Adeptus Mechanicus'u korku içinde bıraktı. Zincirlenmiş yarı tanrı önünde diz çöktüler, kararlılıklarını yitirdiler ve koloninin yönetimine daha fazla müdahil olmadılar. Hür Tacir'in giderek cüretkârlaşan naipleri, cemaatten olmayanlardan ırak tutulan kutsal bilgileri öğrenip efendilerine aktardı.
languages.original_text: The subjugation of Null Caliph left the Adeptus Mechanicus in awe. Kneeling before the chained demigod, they lost their resolve and no longer interfered in the governance of the colony. With ever increasing boldness, the Rogue Trader's viceroys gained access to sacraments inaccessible to the laity and handed them over to their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: Hiçlik Halifesi'nin zaptedilmesi, Adeptus Mechanicus'u korku içinde bıraktı. Zincirlenmiş yarı tanrı önünde diz çöktüler, kararlılıklarını yitirdiler ve koloninin yönetimine daha fazla müdâhil olmadılar. Hür Tacir'in giderek cüretkârlaşan naipleri, cemaatten olmayanlara kapalı olan kutsal törenleri ellerine geçirdiler ve onları efendilerine teslim ettiler.
